dt: {bc}a band worn to hold up a stocking or sock
{bc}a band worn to hold up a shirt sleeve
{bc}a strap hanging from a girdle or corset to support a stocking
{bc}the blue velvet garter that is its badge

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French {it}gareter{/it}, from {it}garet{/it} thigh, shank, of Celtic origin; akin to Welsh {it}gar{/it} shank
shortdef: a band worn to hold up a stocking or sock
a band worn to hold up a shirt sleeve
a strap hanging from a girdle or corset to support a stocking

dt: {bc}to support with or as if with a garter

shortdef: to support with or as if with a garter

dt: {bc}any of a genus ({it}Thamnophis{/it}) of harmless viviparous American snakes with longitudinal stripes on the back

shortdef: any of a genus (Thamnophis) of harmless viviparous American snakes with longitudinal stripes on the back

dt: {bc}a piece of underwear that is worn around a woman's waist and hips and that has pieces of material that hang down (called garters) that are used to hold up a stocking

shortdef: a piece of underwear that is worn around a woman's waist and hips and that has pieces of material that hang down (called garters) that are used to hold up a stocking
